Reviews.Content: hotel gorgeous walked lobby looked lovely drinks really expensive wine 2 euros cheapest rest close station 5 mins amsterdam centraal leave station side get trams walk straight left hand side got another name case think youve got wrong one havent square trees nearby shaped sign someone mentioning dodgy area amsterdam one places world really doubt youd worry anyway staff polite however wouldnt say rooms amazing 4 star would say would 3 12 nice ive ones also say pay tv movie channels couple dodgy dirty ones warned 4 5 english channels 2 including bbc1 milk teas although stuff coffee way double rooms double bed two pushed together im letting know first night put us wrong room one paid apologetic whole thing let us much nicer one room clean though overall experience nice would still recommend

Reviews.Title: “A1 Location, good hotel...”
Reviews.Author: big_punter
Reviews.Content: stayed 19th 20th february stayed convenient central station dont get taxi 5 minutes walk reception friendly stayed yes said need came reply room excellent appreciate location good shopping bags hotel 3 minutes shops easy go back drop one problem day 1 ran dining room back much amusement staff dont though contacted management wee due delivery food ground floor goes 1st floor service lift amsterdam terrible problem check load one got fair refunded breakfast costs eating area spotless really would worry highly recommended id stay

Reviews.Title: “overated”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: recently stayed golden tulip hotel inntel amsterdam centre 3 nights got excellent deal hotel paid 3 nights included breakfast taxes 3 nights price 2 offer dates chose cannot fault hotel arrived asked wanted twin beds double smoking non smoking room chose double non smoking given room number told given upgrade free charge room lovely modern nicely furnished spotlessly clean bed least king size really comfortable fact think comfortable hotel bed ever slept bathroom equally impressive nice toiletries also safe wardrobe free charge dont carry valuables youre sightseeing breakfast good usual continental choices plus eggs bacon sausages coffee staff friendly helpful without exception fact everywhere went found people really nice location good would stay definitely would recommend friends without hesitation

Reviews.Title: “Expensive Breakfast”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: boyfriend stayed hotel posh lovely room lovely entrance also hotel bar nice open fire away bed massive pleased would recommend near everything would defo stay

Reviews.Title: “inntel is great”
Reviews.Author: hoppefan
Reviews.Content: location good shopping plenty public transportation museum visits variety eating places hotel staff friendly helpful breakfast full buffet european american style stayed week pleasant stay

Reviews.Title: “A nice place..”
Reviews.Author: IUBBFAN
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 4 nights lovely time exploring amsterdam room booked superior room one dutch booking websites get best price disappointed staff polite welcoming good service area lovely open fire situated middle adds traditional feel otherwise modern hotel also two computers free internet access location great quiet evenings trouble sleeping short walk dam square main tram stop main road short walk hotel although hotel less 10 minute walk central station wont hear trains thing wont get hotel view isnt canal dam square didnt bother us room wasnt huge certainly clean comfortable offering everything needed hangers tea tray tv english channels want amsterdam kids dont let turn tv bathroom clean decor good condition thing disappointed us breakfast offer discount voucher breakfast check pay euros worth luckily hadnt booked advance one morning try see worth price isnt shame fault hotel breakfast room looks lovely outside problem loads restaurants tea rooms within two minute walk offering much cheaper english breakfast would stay hotel eat breakfast see hotels around canals probably better views didnt look nice honest looking hotel aware says golden tulip inntel front golden tulip amsterdam centre might expect ive given hotel 4 rather 5 simply lack breakfast view extra note go amsterdam visit ann frank house museum moving worth visit even though included amsterdam card

Reviews.Title: “Great location and staff”

Reviews.Content: made mistake breakfast buffet cost 55 euro checked food good good

Reviews.Title: “what a find”

Reviews.Content: located centraal station dam square terrific location staff friendly helpful arrived early friday morning flight accomodating getting us room soon possible great recommending dining options helping us navigate tram system three first put room keycard special room turn left ac went room uncomfortable give us extra key housekeeping apparently took finished day second strange instead shower curtain full always felt needed near shower head spray water using wrong finally housekeeping staff doesnt seem think disturb sign werent room time phone knocking door overall would recommend hotel would stay without hesitation

Reviews.Title: “Location/Location”

Reviews.Content: stayed inntel eight nights may year staff helpful accomodating although arrived posted checkin time gave us room even upgraded us first room turned noisy adjacent outdoor cafe opened gave us even larger quiet room back location wonderful 5 minute walk centraal station along main street adjacent hotel steps tram stop also main street great restaurants steak crowded holland complaint drawers americans used addition closet shelves store clothing although spent eight nights could used one much see around amsterdam
